title: Why i feel this version, AP has no damage
body: This new version is really really really bad. First, except adc and ad champ, now AP totally has no damage. Tank who's skills are magical damage, like Galio has high damage and very very very tanky or tanks who are physical damage build as tank also have high damage. Second, feel like is really really have to build ability power, i don't know why!! Hate the new version so much.

replies.body: Yes, even when I one shot people with {{champion:34}}, I too feel like I have no damage.

I think the realisation your having is your playing alot of early game champs and not getting anywhere near enough kills to snowball and therefore be of any use after 20 mins. Be move aggressive with whoever you play or try playing an AP champ mid and starting {{item:1082}} See how it goes for you : ^)

gtfo of here.

 galio has high damage if he lanes against an ap champ because he can build a combination of these {{item:3001}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3060}}{{item:3174}} {{item:3111}}   and gain extra ap from his passive while remaining super tanky against a mage
